data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Sonipat, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sonipat, Haryana, India

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 15,950 believers in Sonipat that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Sonipat to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Sonipat, Haryana, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Thathera (Hindu traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, please give every church in the county of Sonipat a passion to plant another simple church.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Sonipat, Haryana, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Sonipat.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

location.name: Sonipat
location.people_groups_list: Bania Mahajan, Brahmin Gaur, Jat Makiwal, Bhatia (Hindu traditions), Rajput Jhala
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bania Mahajan (187,000), Brahmin Gaur (3,040,000), Jat Makiwal (19,000), Bhatia (Hindu traditions) (233,000), Rajput Jhala (26,000)
